description: Dark Horse Comics has revealed a new comic miniseries titled Stranger Things and Dungeons & Dragons: The Rise of Hellfire, set to release on February 19. The four-issue series serves as a prequel to Stranger Things Season 4, focusing on Eddie Munson and his role in forming the Hellfire Club. The series is written by...
title: Dark Horse Announces Stranger Things and Dungeons & Dragons: The Rise of Hellfire Featuring Eddie Munson for 2025

description: Kurt Vonnegut, widely recognized for his literary contributions, particularly Slaughterhouse-Five, also ventured into game design. His board game, GHQ, originally created in 1956, has now been published after nearly seven decades. Following the moderate reception of his first novel, Player Piano, Vonnegut sought alternative ways to earn an income. Drawing on his World War II...
title: Kurt Vonnegut’s Lost Board Game GHQ Now Available

description: Lucca Comics & Games will mark the 50th anniversary of Dungeons & Dragons with a series of events running from October 26 to November 3, in Lucca, Italy. The celebration will include an extensive art exhibition, along with a unique tribute to the creators of the game, Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson. A central feature...
title: Dungeons & Dragons Celebrates 50th Anniversary at Lucca Comics & Games 2024

description: Last week, Nighthawk Games launched the Kickstarter campaign for Half Truth: Second Guess, the stand-alone sequel to the popular trivia game Half Truth. This new version includes updated trivia content and team-based gameplay, designed to appeal to both experienced trivia players and newcomers alike. Half Truth: Second Guess was created by Jeopardy! host Ken Jennings...
title: Half Truth: Second Guess, From Magic: The Gathering Creator, Introduces New Trivia Gameplay

description: Insania, an upcoming co-op dungeon crawler from Sievert Games, is preparing for its Kickstarter launch on November 19th. Set in ancient Rome, the game introduces players to a dark and unsettling narrative, incorporating themes of horror, violence, and mature content. Players will take on the roles of legionaries, gladiators, and oracles as they face nightmarish...
title: INSANIA Brings Horror to Ancient Rome in New Co-op Board Game

description: Studio Far Horizons has revealed The Last Wardens Tabletop Roleplaying Game, based on the Mad Cave Studios comic series by Amit Tishler and Elliot Sperl. Set in 1975 America, the game places players in the role of Wardens, tasked with defending humanity against an ancient and powerful force. The game incorporates elements of grindhouse-style horror,...
title: Studio Far Horizons Announces The Last Wardens Tabletop RPG: A Cosmic Horror Set in 1970s America
